programme.title: MST3K: Master Ninja II
programme.desc: Joel and the 'bots endure two equally bad episodes from the failed action series The Master (1984).

programme.title: MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Man
programme.desc: Our heroes discover how boring an alien attack on Tokyo can be when they view an anti-vehicle for Sonny Chiba.

programme.title: MST3K: Eegah
programme.desc: A teenage girl, her boyfriend, and her scientist father discover a caveman in the desert in Eegah (1962).

programme.title: MST3K: The Sidehackers
programme.desc: A motorcycle racer and a violent stunt rider start a war of vengeance against each other.

programme.title: MST3K: The Painted Hills
programme.desc: A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners.

programme.title: MST3K: The Touch Of Satan
programme.desc: An aimless young man encounters a rural family that seems to have some secrets.

programme.title: MST3K: Girl In Gold Boots
programme.desc: Mike and the bots put Girl In Gold Boots in their crosshairs and take it down.

programme.title: MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze
programme.desc: Joel and the Bots try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).

programme.title: Cinematic Titanic: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
programme.desc: The children of Mars are in a funk, so Martian King Kimar comes up with a solution to kidnap Santa Claus.

programme.title: MST3K: Space Mutiny
programme.desc: Mike and the bots learn the 80s were worse than they thought as they endure the sci-fi epic, Space Mutiny.

programme.title: Rifftrax: Icebreaker
programme.desc: It's Die Hard on Skis starring the legendary Bruce Campbell!

programme.title: MST3K: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt to save a dying Father Christmas.

programme.title: MST3K: Mitchell
programme.desc: A sleazy, incompetent detective tries to simultaneously take down heroin dealers and a socialite.
